description:
Raoh and Black King were on a walk. Black King remembers the first time he met Raoh, when suddenly, Raoh is kidnapped.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Raoh is Kidnapped! Suddenly a Love Story \ Jagi is the Star! I Was Waiting For This
Raou Sarawareru! Love Story wa Toutotsu ni / Jagi Shuyaku! Kono Toki o Matte Ita no Da
ラオウさらわれる! ラブストーリーはトウトツに / ジャギ主役! この時を待っていたのだ
